reminders.english: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

reminders.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
reminders.transliteration: Allahumma infa'ni bima 'allamtani, wa 'allimni ma yanfa'uni, wa zidni 'ilma
reminders.english: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, teach me what will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.

reminders.arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
reminders.transliteration: Rabbi-shrah li sadri, wa yassir li amri, wahlul 'uqdatan min lisani, yafqahu qawli
reminders.english: My Lord, expand for me my chest, ease for me my task, and untie the knot from my tongue that they may understand my speech.

reminders.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
reminders.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
reminders.english: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision, and accepted deeds.

reminders.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
reminders.transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahla, wa Anta taj'alul-hazna idha shi'ta sahla
reminders.english: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You make difficulty easy if You wish.
